sections.name: overview
sections.prompt: Provide an evocative 2-3 sentence overview that captures the artistic merit, visual impact, and appeal of this artwork.

sections.name: artist_background
sections.prompt: Include relevant information about the artist, their career, artistic movement, and significance in art history.

sections.name: artwork_description
sections.prompt: Describe the subject matter, composition, color palette, technique, and artistic style in detail.

sections.name: medium_technique
sections.prompt: Detail the medium, materials, and techniques used, including any notable or distinctive artistic methods.

sections.name: condition_assessment
sections.prompt: Assess the physical condition, noting any restoration, conservation issues, or original state preservation.

sections.name: provenance_exhibition
sections.prompt: Document known ownership history, exhibition history, publications, and any certificates of authenticity.

sections.name: collector_notes
sections.prompt: Provide insights on collecting this artist or style, market context, and display recommendations.

description_structure.tone: sophisticated yet accessible, art historically informed, evocative and descriptive

condition_criteria.Excellent: Museum quality, no visible issues, professionally conserved if needed
condition_criteria.Very Good: Minor age-related wear, no significant damage or restoration
condition_criteria.Good: Light wear, may have minor restoration, displays well
condition_criteria.Fair: Visible wear or damage, may need conservation, sold as-is
condition_criteria.Poor: Significant damage or deterioration, requires restoration

frame_condition.Gallery Frame: Professional quality frame appropriate to work

Reluctance to provide documentation or history

display_recommendations.lighting: Avoid direct sunlight; use UV-filtered lighting
display_recommendations.temperature: Keep stable, avoid extremes and fluctuations
display_recommendations.handling: Use cotton gloves; support from below
